label: حَسْبِيَ اللّٰهُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no god except Him.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
translation: Glory and praise be to Allah.

label: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ
translation: In the name of Allah, with Whose name nothing can harm.
